Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP13
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP13.view.GUI

Interface GodHandlerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GodInput, GodSelection
public interface GodHandlerInterface
This interface is used to create a state pattern in order to give to the same view in godSelection.fxml a different behaviour whether the game is in the GodSelection phase (the challenger is choosing the gods for this match) or the GodInput phase (players are chosing their god for the match from the ones choosed previously by the challenger)
